localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Synced with calendar, MeetingRule displays the real-time availability of any space and lets you book it directly from the device. This helps start any meeting on time, finish it in time, eliminate unnecessary meetings, and boost the corporate productivity.
blogPost.body: Synced with calendar, MeetingRule displays the real-time availability of any space and lets you book it directly from the device. This helps start any meeting on time, finish it in time, eliminate unnecessary meetings, and boost the corporate productivity.
blogPost.title: MeetingRule - Office space bookings simplified. It just syncs.
blogPost.author: Samuel alex 🔥

localize.description: 与日历同步，MeetingRule显示任何空间的实时可用性，让你直接从设备上预订。这有助于准时开始任何会议，及时完成会议，消除不必要的会议，提高企业生产力。
localize.tagline: 办公空间预订简化。就是同步。

localize.description: 與日曆同步，MeetingRule顯示任何空間的實時可用性，讓你直接從設備上預訂。這有助於準時開始任何會議，及時完成會議，消除不必要的會議，提高企業生產力。
localize.tagline: 辦公空間預訂簡化。就是同步。

previous.excerpt: Better collaboration for product teams in multiple time zones. Exchange video, voice, and screen recordings with your team at the tap of a button.
previous.title: PingPong - Video messaging for remote teams

localize.description: 为多时区的产品团队提供更好的协作。只需轻点按钮，即可与您的团队交换视频、语音和屏幕记录。
localize.tagline: 远程团队的视频信息传递

localize.description: 爲多時區的產品團隊提供更好的協作。只需輕點按鈕，即可與您的團隊交換視頻、語音和屏幕記錄。
localize.tagline: 遠程團隊的視頻信息傳遞

next.excerpt: Amigos is a hand-drawn illustration library excellent for creating infinite compositions! Be one of the first to test out these doodles exclusively with Blush Pro.
next.title: Amigos - Customizable illustrations for any project

localize.description: Amigos是一个手绘插画库，非常适合创作无限的作品! 成为第一批试用这些Blush Pro专属涂鸦的人。
localize.tagline: 可为任何项目定制插图

localize.description: Amigos是一個手繪插畫庫，非常適合創作無限的作品! 成爲第一批試用這些Blush Pro專屬塗鴉的人。
localize.tagline: 可爲任何項目定製插圖
